scripts.build: npm run build:install-peers && rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run build:rollup && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public --tag alpha
scripts.publish:latest: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish:next: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.publish:promote-next: npm dist-tag add @mcler/webpack-concat-plugin@$(npm dist-tag ls @mcler/webpack-concat-plugin | grep next | sed 's/next\: //g') latest
scripts.test:create-sourcemaps: esbuild test/fixtures-sourcemaps/source.js --sourcemap=linked --outfile=test/fixtures-sourcemaps/linked.js && esbuild test/fixtures-sourcemaps/source.js --sourcemap=external --outfile=test/fixtures-sourcemaps/external.js && esbuild test/fixtures-sourcemaps/source.js --sourcemap=inline --outfile=test/fixtures-sourcemaps/inline.js
scripts.test:prepare: npm run test:clean ; npm run test:create-sourcemaps
